Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii


(Sorry, gotta go back a bit to create this character)

Megastorm:

     The Tripredicus council had decided to do away with Megatron. Using the remenants of the Generation 2 Megatron (the Tank), they made a new monster to be their assassin. They modified the tank to fit into normal Transformer society, no use having a huge Transformer walking around for them. He was now only 15 feet tall (hope that's ok, I'll scale down if need be). The way the tank was, it became a mixture of the old, and the new, in robot mode his tank treads were shoulders and he had a huge "crown" on his head, the cannon folded behind his back in robot mode.

     They sent this new agent to Earth. He crashed nowhere near any base and had to make his own way. He came across Galvatron's base, after determining who the leader was he sent a comm, "Hello, Galvatron, I am wondering, where are you at right now?" He sat down on a large rock. His deep voice echoed, and had a metalic rasp to it. "I was also wondering, do you know where Megatron is?"
